snippet: The defense was granted a one-week delay in the trial of Sergei L. Magnitsky, a whistle-blowing lawyer who died in prison in a case that has roiled Russian-American relations.
lead_paragraph: The defense was granted a one-week delay in the trial of Sergei L. Magnitsky, a whistle-blowing lawyer who died in prison in a case that has roiled Russian-American relations.

headline.main: Russian Judge Delays Trial of Dead Lawyer
headline.print_headline: Russian Judge Delays Trial of Dead Lawyer
